attributes.additional_details:
Ataxia is one of the worst conditions that can affect anyone. It is Rare, Neurological, incurable, untreatable, life-limiting and inexorable in its progression.

Unfortunately, we don't know enough about it to do anything about it.

Awareness of this terrible affliction is key to making any remote inroads towards control/cure.

By signing this e-petition or visiting www.ataxia.org.uk you are making an enormous contribution towards the satisfactory conclusion of the most arduous and noble journey.
